53303.summary: Some customers in Glenelm and West Elmwood area of Winnipeg are experiencing an interruption to Television services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
53303.title: Sept 11 - Winnipeg (Glenelm and West Elmwood)| Video Services - Outage (Resolved)

live_updates: Technicians continue working diligently to resolve this outage. Thank you for your patience.
Due to the complexity of this outage, our technicians are still working to resolve.
Further issues in the area have been found.  Teams are back on site working towards a resolution.
Power has been restored and services should be restored.  We will continue to monitor.
We continue to await restoration of power in the affected areas. Once power is restored, our services will begin to come online.
